oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial View of Christian Brothers College, from the East, late 1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Aerial photographs; Educational facilities; Aerial views
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
This photo was taken before the construction of the Bell Tower on Christian Brothers College campus.
The High School building (later known as Kenrick Hall), the Administration Building (later known as Barry Hall), St. Joseph Hall, Battersby Hall, the De La Salle Gymnasium, the Barracks, Ave Maria Hall, and the auxiliary buildings made up the campus buildings at the time of this photo.
